titleInfo.title: Statue of Queen Nefertari Touching Leg of Husband Rameses II, Two Nile Gods Bending sma-sign (`union`), left

mods.abstract: Statue of Queen Nefertari touching leg of Husband Rameses II (New Kingdom - Dynasty XIX) at Luxor, East Thebes; straight plinth statue of Queen Nefertari wearing single feather crown touching her husband's leg, hieroglyphs and Queen 's cartouche (right of statue); incised image of two Nile gods bending sma-sign between them (figure on right visible) surrounded by hieroglyphs, cartouche, uraei, and papyrus; untitled print, "545" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

name.namePart: Nefertari, Queen, consort of Ramses II, King of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
